targets.expr:
quantile(0.99,
    irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", method = "POST", uri="/user"}[5m]) 
    / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", method = "POST", uri="/user"}[5m])
) by (method, uri)

quantile(0.95,
    irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", method = "POST", uri="/user"}[5m]) 
    / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", method = "POST", uri="/user"}[5m])
) by (method, uri)

quantile(0.5,
    irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", method = "POST", uri="/user"}[5m]) 
    / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", method = "POST", uri="/user"}[5m])
) by (method, uri)

quantile(0.99,
    irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", method = "GET", uri="/user/{userId}"}[5m])
